english.segment1: Would I believe you when you would say. Your hand will guide my every way. Will I receive the words You say. Every moment of every day
english.segment2: Chorus: Well I will walk by faith. Even when I cannot see. Well because this broken road. Prepares Your will for me
english.segment3: Help me to win my endless fears. You've been so faithful for all my years. With one breath You make me new. Your grace covers all I do
english.segment4: yeah, yeah , yeah, yeah, yeah, ya
english.segment6: Well I'm broken, but I still see Your face. Well You've spoken, pouring Your words of grace
english.segment8: Well hallelujah, hallelu. (I will walk by faith). Well hallelujah, hallelu. (I will walk by faith)
english.segment9: I will walk, I will walk, I will walk by faith. I will, I will, I will walk by faith
